issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Improve documentation on LogicalPlan variants
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9695](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9695). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I think we could improve the documentation somewhat on LogicalPlan nodes. I will submit a PR with a proposal.
